entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Westport

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
